content:
ICS 153

Computer Networks

 

Here is the latest course syllabus: 153 Course Syllabus

 

Links to Networking Information

Intel's on-line learning center: Intel Channel

Anixter (A supplier of Layer 1 items): Anixter

Cisco (A supplier of Networking products): Cisco

Allied Telesyn (A supplier of Networking products): Allied Telesyn

FAQ for Network Cabling: Cabling-FAQ

Motorola's Iridium project (Chapter 2 in our book): http://www.mot.com/GSS/SSTG/projects/iridium/

Request For Comments (RFC) documents: http://www.rfc-editor.org

Homework

Chapter #1 (Due at the Distro. Center @ 11am 8 OCT 98): 2, 7, 8, 10, 11, 12, 15, 18, 23, 25

Chapter # 2 (Due at the Distro. Center @ 11am 15 OCT 98): 6, 16, 17, 18, 21, 26, 32, 43, 49, 50

Chapter # 3 (Due at the Distro Center @ 11am 22 OCT 98): 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 9, 10, 19, 29, 30

Chapter #4 (Due at the Distro. Center @ 11am 5 NOV 98): 2, 17, 18, 22, 23, 25, 29, 31, 33, 35

Chapter #5a (Due at Distro. Center @ 11am on 17 NOV 98): 1, 3, 4, 6, 9

Chapter #5b (Due at Distro. Center @ 11am on 24 NOV 98): 25, 28, 29, 30, 38

Chapter 6 (Due at Distro. Center @ 11am on 3 DEC 98): 5, 6, 13, 15, 17, 18, 19, 21, 23, 33

 

Announcements

  1. Please email your questions to Sachin ( Sachin@ics.uci.edu ) and he will make a list of the most frequent ones for the Wednesday discussion section.
  2. There will be no homework for Chapter7. The Project will be worth 60 points.
  3. The lecture notes are available here:
